author: Fextralife
description:
Nightreign Everdark Sovereign LIBRA Creature of Night UPDATE & GAMEPLAY, TIPS & New GEAR
In this Elden Ring Nightreign video, we're going to be talking a little bit about the Everdark Sovereign Libra Boss fight. I just finished this today. I spent quite a bit of time yesterday on it. This fight probably took me 12-15  attempts or something like that. We had a lot of very close attempts in there. There were ones we had to down 10%, 5%. But this is by far the hardest boss fight that exists currently.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki

Timestamp:
0:00 Everdark Sovereign Event
0:34 New Relic
1:20 Libra Creature of Night Everdark Sovereign Event
